caption.p: Effects of M. fragrans on LPS (500 ng/mL)-stimulated RAW 264.7 cells after 24 h of treatment. NO inhibition percentage of MFE-M, MFE-H, and MFE-E ( A). PGE 2 inhibition percentage of MFE-E at various concentrations (6.25–25 µg/mL) ( B). * p < 0.01 compared with Control; B: Blank (without LPS induction), C: Control (LPS induction without MFE-E treatment).
